derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English : from Old French adjectif -ive, from Latin adject- 'added', from the verb adicere, from ad- 'towards' + jacere 'throw'. The term was originally used in the phrase noun adjective, translating Latin nomen adjectivum, a translation of Greek onoma epitheton 'attributive name'

entry.def: An adjective is a word such as 'big', 'dead', or 'financial' that describes a person or thing, or gives extra information about them. Adjectives usually come before nouns or after link verbs.

means.word_mean: 1. a word that expresses an attribute of something
2. the word class that qualifies nouns
1. of or relating to or functioning as an adjective;
2. applying to methods of enforcement and rules of procedure;

auth_sentence.content: He himself has become a well-used adjective: Orwellian.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He himself has become a well-used adjective: Orwellian.

auth_sentence.content: "Powerful" may not be the best adjective.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: "Powerful" may not be the best adjective.

auth_sentence.content: The first word was an adjective, "Useless".
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The first word was an adjective, "Useless".

stems_affixes.word_buile: ab离开+ject抛→抛掉→可怜的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 形容词的,用作形容词的
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad增加+ject投掷,扔+ive……的→扔上去的,附加的
deject[v.使沮丧, 使灰心]+ed表形容词→adj.沮丧的,失望的
object[n.物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语 v.[to]反对]+ive……的→客观的[词性变化:作名词,表示"目标,目的"]
sub在下面+ject投掷,扔→扔下去→服从的,扔下去大家讨论的主题
ad增加+ject投掷,扔+ive……的→扔上去的,附加的
eject[v.投出,掷出]+ion表名词→n.喷出, 排出物
inter在……中间+ject投掷,扔+ion表名词→在句子中间扔出的字→感叹词

stems_affixes.value_cn: 物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语
stems_affixes.word_buile: ob逆,反+ject投掷,扔→反着扔→反对→引申为扔向目标

stems_affixes.value_cn: [to]反对,异议,不喜欢,反对的理由
stems_affixes.word_buile: object反对+ion表名词→n.[to]反对,异议,不喜欢,反对的理由
object[n.物体;客体,对象;目标;宾语 v.[to]反对]+ive……的→客观的[词性变化:作名词,表示"目标,目的"]
pro向前+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目
project[v.投射出;n.工程项目]+ile物体→向前扔的物体
project[v.投射出;n.工程项目]+ion表名词→n.射出,投射;计划
re回+ject扔回来→拒绝
reject[v.拒绝,抵制,丢弃,排斥,退掉 n.落选者]+ion表名词→n.退回,拒绝
sub在下面+ject投掷,扔→扔下去→服从的,扔下去大家讨论的主题
subject[n.主题;学科 adj.隶属的;易遭..的 v.使隶属]+ion表名词→n.征服
subject主观+ivity表名词→n.主观性, 主观
tra穿+ject投掷,扔+ory范围→扔出去穿过的范围→弹道轨道
con共同+ject投掷,扔+ure表名词→大家一起扔[思想]→推测
de向下+ject投掷,扔→情绪向下扔→沮丧
e出+ject掷→掷出
in进入+ject投掷,扔→扔进去→注射
ob逆,反+ject投掷,扔→反着扔→反对→引申为扔向目标
pro向前+ject扔→扔向前面→投射;引申为工程项目

Sentence.sentence: Thus, for example, every noun ends in"o", every adjective in"a", and basic form of every verb in"i".

sentences.en: In “the black cat”the adjective “black” modifies the noun “cat”.
sentences.cn: 在“the black cat”这一词组中, 形容词“black”修饰名词“cat”。
